document.docAuthor: Li, Wenliang, Qi, Ling & Yang, Ding
document.masterDocTitle: First record of the genus Trypetisoma Malloch, 1924 (Diptera, Lauxaniidae) for China with nine species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First record of the genus Trypetisoma Malloch, 1924 (Diptera, Lauxaniidae) for China with nine species

paragraph.bibRef:
1. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) australe (Malloch
, 1928 ).
Australian: Australia, Papua New Guinea, Vanuatu
.

2. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) bicincta (de Meijere
, 1910 ).
Oriental: Indonesia, Malaysia
.

3. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) caniventre (Bezzi
, 1928 ).
Australian: Fiji, American Samoa, Niue, Tokelau, Tonga, Western Samoa
.

4. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) cirrhicauda (Bezzi
, 1928 ).
Australian: Fiji
.

5. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) confusum (Malloch
, 1940 ).
Australian: Solomon Is
.

6. Trypetisoma
( Trypaneoides ) costatum (Harrison
, 1959 ).
Australian: New Zealand
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
7.
Trypetisoma ( Trypaneoides ) endosclerita
sp. nov. Oriental
: China ( Yunnan ).

paragraph.bibRef:

.

.

.

.

13. Trypetisoma

.
